queries.query: select id, crmId, quoteNo, title, status, salesName, designerName, amount, projectName, pcity, createdOn, createdBy, updatedOn, updatedBy from proposal where status = ?
select id, crmId, quoteNo, title, status, salesName, designerName, amount, projectName, pcity, createdOn, createdBy, updatedOn, updatedBy from proposal
select status, count(*) as proposal_count from proposal group by status
select * from proposal where id = ?
insert into proposal(status, title, version, createdBy) values ('Active', ?, '1.0', ?)

update proposal set title = ?, crmId = ?, quoteNo = ?, customerId = ?, cname = ?, caddress1 = ?, caddress2 = ?, caddress3 = ?, ccity = ?, cemail = ?, cphone1 = ?, cphone2 = ?, projectName = ?, paddress1 = ?, paddress2 = ?, pcity = ?, salesName = ?, salesEmail = ?, salesPhone = ?,  designerName = ?, designerEmail = ?, designerPhone = ?, amount = ?, updatedBy = ? where id = ?
update proposal set folderPath = ? where id = ?
update proposal set status = 'Submitted' where id = ?
update proposal set status = 'Cancelled' where id = ?
update proposal set status = 'Deleted' where id = ?
insert into proposal_comments (id, proposalid, comment, userid, username, createdon) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select * from proposal_comments where proposalid = ?
insert into proposal_documents (proposalid, type, title, url, userid) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from proposal_documents where id = ?
select * from proposal_documents where proposalid = ?
insert into proposal_documents (proposalid, productid, type, title, url, userid) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select * from proposal_documents where proposalid = ? and productid = ?
select distinct kdmcode from kdmax_mg_map
select kdmcode, kdmdefcode from kdmax_def_map
select code, title, imageurl, width, depth, height, dimension from module_master where code in (select mgcode from kdmax_mg_map where kdmcode = ?)

insert into proposal_product (proposalid, title, type, kdmax_file, room, product_type, product_id, product_name, carcass_code, finish_type, finish_code, make_type, dimension, quantity, amount, notes, modules, addons, createdon, createdby) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

update proposal_product set title = ?, type = ?, kdmax_file = ?, room = ?, product_type = ?, product_id = ?, product_name = ?, carcass_code = ?, finish_type = ?, finish_code = ?,  make_type = ?, dimension = ?, quantity = ?, amount = ?, notes =  ?, moduleJson = ?, addonJson = ?, updatedon = ?, updatedby = ? where id = ?
update proposal_product set active = 'N' where id = ?
select title, type, room, product_type, quantity, product_name, carcass_code, finish_code, make_type, quantity, amount from proposal_product where proposalid = ? and active = 'A'
select * from proposal_product where proposalid = ? and active = 'A' order by type
select * from proposal_product where proposalid = ? and id = ? and active = 'A'
select comptype, compcode, quantity from module_components where modulecode = ?
select modulecode, comptype, compcode, quantity from module_components

select sum(cm.area * mr.rate * mc.quantity) as cost from module_components mc, carcass_master cm, mf_rate_master mr where mc.modulecode = ? and mc.comptype = 'C' and mc.compcode = cm.code and mr.type = 'C' and mr.mfcode = ? and mr.thickness = cm.thickness

select sum(sfx.cuttingarea * mr.rate * mc.quantity) as cost from module_components mc, shutter_finish_xref sfx, mf_rate_master mr where mc.modulecode = ? and mc.comptype = 'S' and mc.compcode = sfx.shuttercode and mr.type = 'S' and mr.mfcode = ? and mr.thickness = sfx.cuttingt
select sum(ahm.price * mc.quantity) as cost from module_components mc, acs_hw_master ahm where mc.modulecode = ? and mc.comptype in ('A', 'H') and mc.compcode = ahm.code
select code, title, plength, breadth, thickness, edgebinding, area from carcass_master
select code, title, plength, breadth, thickness, edgebinding, quantity from shutter_master
select code, title, maketype, make, imageurl, price from acc_hw_master where type = 'A'
select code, title, maketype, make, imageurl, price from acc_hw_master where type = 'H'
select code, title, attr1 as finishType from code_master where type = 'SF'
select code, catalogcode, title, make, imageurl, uom, rate from addon_master where producttype = ? and addontype = ?
